Keywords: A.I.M. , Frightful Four , Masters of Evil , Scientist
Real Name: Ulysses Klaw
Special Powers
SOUND CONSTRUCT: POWER: Generate a Sound Construct blocking terrain marker in a square within range and line of fire [MAX 1]. // FREE: Choose one:
*Place the Sound Construct marker in another square within Klaw's range and line of fire.
*Make a close attack using Klaw's printed combat values, but only to target a character adjacent to his Sound Construct marker regardless of adjacency.
BODY OF PURE SONIC ENERGY: Super Senses, but succeeds on 4-6. When Klaw uses it and fails, you may reduce the damage taken equal to the result. Protected: Outwit.
Trade Klaw Want Klaw

Comments
December 9, 2022
fghrt
Played this guy today, overall enjoyable character. Single target damage was really nice. RCE boosting PW makes it easier to hit, always a plus. I think his p/t gives a nice balance to his play, rather than just throwing r/s and calling it good. This along with his trait causes you to think through each move if you want to maximize his impact. I did find that just being to reposition a blocking terrain marker was very helpful for cover as well as protecting my team from Klaw's own PW. When I did find myself in a bind, his special on defense was stellar. the opponent will have to bring heavy damage if they want to bring him down. Overall great piece imo, would recommend.
November 27, 2022
gambitrmp
Potentially a 3-damage reducer even on a missed senses roll is interesting.
